WorkItem.Description:
While trying to add support for the new ICC raid buff, I tried using the variable BonusHealingDoneMultiplier. Is it possible this can get supported so that this can buff can get fully supported?
 
// Note: Edited issue to the correct variable to use.
 
Model Status:
Tree: n/a
Healadin: 47234
HolyPriest: 47276
RestoSham: Commit 47169

Comments.Message: RSham and Tree should support this buff, but it's not what you should use for the ICC raid buff.

Healing Recieved would be something on the tank and of things that I don't usually go near.  For Healing Done, As soon as a buff name is decided upon and put in, you can bet it will quickly be modeled by all and it's quite easy (Mostly) to add in.

Now that you mention it, I had a thought: Does the Resto Druid aura ( http://www.wowhead.com/?spell=34123 ?) work for other healers or just the heals coming from the Druid? If it does, that seems like something that should be in the buffs list for other healers in case their raid contains a resto Druid, though I've not seen it in the list.
The wording is different from what I remember, it used to mention "from the Druid"

The actual shapeshift spell (http://www.wowhead.com/?spell=33891) isn't very specific either. I want to say I remember the buff saying "from the Druid" too, but I don't remember if that was in BC or early Wrath. Might have been changed with the 3.0 buff consolidations.

I'll test it tonight with my Resto Druid buddy. I'll drop 50 heals on myself with and without the tree aura present and see if there's a difference (6% should be noticeable, right?). I'll report back later tonight.
The multiplier should be added in the next RestoSham commit by tomorrow night.
When the person that edits tree adds the code, please also close the issue at that time (make sure to add the commit number that adds the variable)
